meta.label: AB testing statistics
meta.description: Compute statistics to analyze the result of an AB test

inputRoles.name: results
inputRoles.label: Experiment results
inputRoles.description: This dataset should contain  the experiment's results at a user level. There should be group column and a conversion column.

outputRoles.name: statistics
outputRoles.label: AB testing statistics
outputRoles.description: Statistics required to answer the statistical test

params.name: conversion_column
params.label: Conversion column
params.description: Column indicating if a user converted or not (Binary values)

params.name: group_column
params.label: AB group column
params.description: Column indicating to which group a user belongs (A or B)
